segments.content:
AWF Contract Definition:
- scn: String - Current scene identifier
- txt: String - Narrative text (required, min 50 words)
- optional choices: Array of {choice: string, outcome: string}
- optional acts: Array of action objects
- optional val: Object - World state changes
- TIME_ADVANCE: Number - Time progression in ticks (â‰¥1)
- All responses must be valid JSON
- No markdown formatting
- No code fences

Time System:
- 60-tick bands: Dawn (0-15), Mid-Day (16-30), Evening (31-45), Mid-Night (46-59)
- Each turn advances TIME_ADVANCE ticks (minimum 1)
- Avoid real-world time units
- Use in-game time progression only

Skill System:
- 0-100 scale (50 baseline)
- Skills: combat, stealth, social, lore, survival, medicine, craft
- Relationships: 0-100 scale (50 neutral)
- Essence alignment affects behavior
- Life/Death/Order/Chaos influences
